item.description:
Hi everyone! June is a busy month for family events: school graduations, weddings, sports & dance recitals! This month our meet up falls on Father's day. We will be holding our regular monthly meet up from 11:00am-1:00pm. If you have free time Bring your favorite pup to exercise & socialize. We'll have both the indoor & outdoor areas available so you can relax & unwind from your hectic commitments and enjoy watching fifi & fido goof around with their friends.

Current Proof of Vaccines Required: Rabies, DHLPP, Bordatella
item.name: Happy Father's Day!
